data.htmlContent: Wanna be the absolute HERO of your next party or family gathering? Easy. Just order from the Olive Garden catering menu. ðŸ˜Ž You get giant pans of all your favorite Italian dishes, plus their famous salad and those heavenly breadsticks. It's the easiest way to feed a crowd and make everyone happy. Let's check out the options! ðŸŽ‰

items.review: Be the hero of your next party! This giant pan of Lasagna Classico will have everyone cheering. It's the easiest way to bring the Olive Garden experience home. ðŸŽ‰

items.name: Cheese Ravioli with Marinara or Meat Sauce (Serves 4 â€“ 6)

items.question: What comes with an Olive Garden catering order?
items.answer: Everything you need! Every order comes with grated cheese, all the utensils, table covers, plates, napkins, and even those little after-dinner mints. You can also ask for chafing dishes to keep things warm! ðŸ”¥

items.question: How far in advance do I need to order catering?
items.answer: Just give them a heads-up by 5 p.m. for next-day lunch delivery! But you can also be a super-planner and schedule your order way in advance. They love that!

items.question: Is there a minimum order for catering delivery?
items.answer: Yep, there's a $100 minimum order to get it delivered. That's before taxes and the delivery fee. Easy to hit when you're ordering pans of deliciousness!
